entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
